lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sept. 6 about the United States’ 2-1 victory against El Salvador in World Cup soccer qualifying misstated the locations of the Americans’ qualifying matches in October against Honduras and Costa Rica. The United States will play at Honduras and at home against Costa Rica, not the reverse in each case.
